name: OBAGI C RX system C CLARIFYING SERUM
indications: gradual bleaching hyperpigmented skin conditions chloasma , melasma , freckles , senile lentigines , unwanted areas melanin hyperpigmentation .
contraindications: thin application applied twice daily directed physician . improvement seen three ( 3 ) months treatment , product discontinued . sun exposure limited using sunscreen agent protective clothing cover bleached skin using using product order prevent darkening reoccurring .
warningsAndPrecautions: obagi-c® rx system c-clarifying serum ( hydroquinone , usp 4 % ) normal dry skin available follows : 1 fl . oz . ( 30 ml ) bottle ndc 62032-106-10 obagi-c® rx system c-clarifying serum ( hydroquinone , usp 4 % ) normal oily skin available follows : 1 fl . oz . ( 30 ml ) bottle ndc 62032-122-10 obagi-c® rx system c-therapy night cream ( hydroquinone , usp 4 % ) available follows : net wt . 2 oz . ( 57 g ) bottle ndc 62032-105-36 store controlled room temperature : 15° 25°c ( 59° 77°f ) . keep direct sunlight .
adverseReactions: people prior history sensitivity allergic reaction product ingredients . safety topical hydroquinone pregnancy children ( 12 years ) established .
indications_original: The gradual bleaching of hyperpigmented skin conditions such as chloasma, melasma, freckles, senile lentigines, and other unwanted areas of melanin hyperpigmentation.
contraindications_original: A thin application should be applied once or twice daily or as directed by a physician. If no improvement is seen after three (3) months of treatment, use of this product should be discontinued. Sun exposure should be limited by using a sunscreen agent or protective clothing to cover bleached skin when using and after using this product in order to prevent darkening from reoccurring.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Obagi-C® Rx System C-Clarifying Serum
                     (Hydroquinone, USP 4%) for Normal to Dry Skin is available as follows: 1 fl. oz. (30 mL) bottle    NDC 62032-106-10
                  
                     Obagi-C® Rx System C-Clarifying Serum
                     (Hydroquinone, USP 4%) for Normal to Oily Skin is available as follows: 1 fl. oz. (30 mL) bottle    NDC 62032-122-10
                  
                     Obagi-C® Rx System C-Therapy Night Cream
                     (Hydroquinone, USP 4%) is available as follows: Net wt. 2 oz. (57 g) bottle    NDC 62032-105-36
                  Store at controlled room temperature: 15° to 25°C (59° to 77°F). Keep out of direct sunlight.
adverseReactions_original: People with prior history of sensitivity or allergic reaction to this product or any of its ingredients should not use it. The safety of topical hydroquinone use during pregnancy or in children (12 years and under) has not been established.
